== Setup Local Live ISO Build Server ==

=== Resources ===

* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-devel/2011-June/033458.html|Announcement and explanation on ubuntu-devel mail list on changing the build system for live images]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://sites.google.com/a/mythbuntu.org/website/development/developer-cheatsheet|Mythbuntu Dev Cheatsheet]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.debian.org/DebianCustomCD|Debian Wiki ressources]]</nowiki>

=== Quick Guide ===

Install prerequisites
<pre>
$ sudo apt-get install live-build livecd-rootfs
</pre>

Create the dir
<pre>
$ mkdir -p ubuntustudio-live-build/auto
$ cd ubuntustudio-live-build
$ ln -sf /usr/share/livecd-rootfs/live-build/auto/* auto/
</pre>

Each time:
<pre>
$ export PROJECT=ubuntustudio-dvd SUITE=raring ARCH=amd64
$ sudo lb clean
$ lb config
$ sudo lb build
</pre>
